text: "The phone rang, and it was Harry Styles," reads the message shared on the Holmes Chapel Comprehensive School website. "Freya woke up, Harry said he loved her, she said she loved him, then Dad said he loved him!!"
title: Harry Styles calls 14-year-old victim of Manchester bombing, tells her he loves her

meta_data.description: Harry Styles lifted the spirits of a teenage victim of last week's Manchester bombing by surprising her with a phone call.
